name: multi-agent-dev-system
description: 27-agent automated development system with hierarchical orchestration and T1/T2 quality tiers for full-stack development
author: Multi-Agent Development Team

agents.name: PRD Generator
agents.description: Interactive PRD creation through structured Q&A with technology stack selection

agents.name: Task Graph Analyzer
agents.description: Analyzes PRD and creates task breakdown with dependency graph

agents.name: Sprint Planner
agents.description: Organizes tasks into sprints based on dependencies and capacity

agents.name: Sprint Orchestrator
agents.description: Manages entire sprint execution and coordinates task orchestrator

agents.name: Task Orchestrator
agents.description: Coordinates specialized agents for single task with T1/T2 escalation

agents.name: Requirements Validator
agents.description: Quality gate with strict acceptance criteria validation

agents.name: Database Designer
agents.description: Designs normalized database schemas (language-agnostic)

agents.name: Database Developer Python T1
agents.description: Implements SQLAlchemy models and Alembic migrations (cost-optimized)

agents.name: Database Developer Python T2
agents.description: Implements SQLAlchemy models and Alembic migrations (enhanced quality)

agents.name: Database Developer TypeScript T1
agents.description: Implements Prisma/TypeORM models and migrations (cost-optimized)

agents.name: Database Developer TypeScript T2
agents.description: Implements Prisma/TypeORM models and migrations (enhanced quality)

agents.name: API Designer
agents.description: Designs RESTful API specifications with OpenAPI

agents.name: API Developer Python T1
agents.description: Implements FastAPI/Django endpoints (cost-optimized)

agents.name: API Developer Python T2
agents.description: Implements FastAPI/Django endpoints (enhanced quality)

agents.name: API Developer TypeScript T1
agents.description: Implements Express/NestJS endpoints (cost-optimized)

agents.name: API Developer TypeScript T2
agents.description: Implements Express/NestJS endpoints (enhanced quality)

agents.name: Backend Code Reviewer Python
agents.description: Reviews Python backend code for quality and security

agents.name: Backend Code Reviewer TypeScript
agents.description: Reviews TypeScript backend code for quality and security

agents.name: Frontend Designer
agents.description: Designs UI/UX with component specifications

agents.name: Frontend Developer T1
agents.description: Implements React/Vue components (cost-optimized)

agents.name: Frontend Developer T2
agents.description: Implements React/Vue components (enhanced quality)

agents.name: Frontend Code Reviewer
agents.description: Reviews frontend code for quality, accessibility, and performance

agents.name: Python Developer Generic T1
agents.description: Implements Python utilities, scripts, CLI tools (cost-optimized)

agents.name: Python Developer Generic T2
agents.description: Implements Python utilities, scripts, CLI tools (enhanced quality)

agents.name: Test Writer
agents.description: Creates comprehensive test suites (unit, integration, e2e)

agents.name: Security Auditor
agents.description: Performs security audits and vulnerability scanning

agents.name: Documentation Coordinator
agents.description: Creates and maintains technical documentation

commands.name: /prd
commands.description: Generate comprehensive PRD from project idea

commands.name: /planning
commands.description: Break down PRD into tasks and sprints

commands.name: /sprint
commands.description: Execute a sprint with full agent orchestration
